messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Fact or Fiction
messages.msgSnippet: My understanding is that they did. I ve read that several times in different places. Probably it s true?  But if so,  it does make you wonder why a better
messages.messageBody:
My understanding is that they did. I've read that several times in different
places. Probably it's true? But if so, it does make you wonder why a better
guard wasn't set on those things!

-MissB


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Fact or Fiction
messages.msgSnippet: While discussing the finer points of  Yashima Norito s portrayal of Takeda Kanryuusai :-)  Sec and I were wondering if there was any truth to the scene where
messages.messageBody:
While discussing the finer points of Yashima Norito's portrayal of
Takeda Kanryuusai :-) Sec and I were wondering if there was any truth
to the scene where the Ishin return to the Masuya warehouse/store to
retrieve their hidden weapons.

Has anyone come across reference to this incident?


--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
